title: Working student R&D
description: Researching and programming a proof of concept to demonstrate the feasibility of a transforming the current HIX application to a webbased application. This involved working with various languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems.

title: Student-assistent
description: Assisting students in their first year and helping them with programming-related questions.

title: Junior Software Developer
description: Building and maintaining a web application that enables users to easily create digital work orders, input materials, hours and questionnaires, take photos, obtain customer signatures or direct payments, and maintain organized records.

title: Co-founder
description: I was responsible for designing and developing responsive React Native applications, following best practices for the entire software development life cycle including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, and build processes. This involved working with various languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems.

title: Junior software-engineer
description: I was responsible for designing and building an application that enables users to access a virtual desktop, collaborating with experienced programmers to devise, design and market technologies, and constructing scalable, fault-tolerant index and query systems that are easy to manage and use.

title: Cashier
description: As a cashier, I was involved with processing customer transactions, handling cash and other payment methods, and providing customer service.
